Meta (Facebook) pixel integration for Nuxt. Multi-pixel, auto page view and more.
I needed a Facebook pixel integration for a large project, but what I found didn't meet my expectations. That's why I took the time to understand how a pixel works and developed
a unique integration that's as simple as it should be
much more effective than any other integration
✨  Written in TypeScript, even the Facebook's events are typed.
🤖  You can load as much meta pixels as you want.
event are sent automatically based on configurable route match.
🚀  All the possibilities offered by Facebook are available:

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Generate type stubs
npm run dev:prepare

# Develop with the playground
npm run dev

# Build the playground
npm run dev:build

# Run ESLint
npm run lint

# Run Vitest
npm run test
npm run test:watch

# Release new version
npm run release
